medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced epigastric abdominal band-like pain for the past few weeks, associated with daily watery diarrhea. Recently, she started experiencing diffuse periumbilical pain a day before admission, which became more localized to the right lower quadrant during the night. Denies any nausea/vomiting, fever, or chills.
